name: Bai Dinh Pagoda – Trang An cave full day
description: Bai Dinh Pagoda – Trang An cave full day, The Trang An Tourism Complex in the northern province of Ninh Binh was officially included in the world heritage list on June 23, 2014 by the UNESCO’s World Heritage Committee. With hundreds of statues, Bai Dinh is considered one of the biggest Pagoda and has the most statues in Vietnam. Joining this tour, you have chance to visit both attractions of Ninh Binh. The Bai Dinh Trang An tour in Ninh Binh is very popular in festival after Luna new year holiday.
